name: Mr Dice's Tabletop Playground
description:
Mr. Dice's Tabletop Playground is a short little platformer I made for the 48 hour 2022 GMTK Game Jam. The theme was "Roll of the Dice". In the game you take control of Mr. Dice, platforming around with the special ability of being able to roll yourself for extra height and speed. Collect all 6 game pieces to win!

(Controls: WASD to move, Space to jump, RMB to toggle modes, Escape to pause)

Credit:

  • Some of the sounds in this project were created by ViRiX Dreamcore (David McKee) soundcloud.com/virix
  • Ambient audio created by Ted Kerr
  • Music : "Bossa Antigua" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)

  • Wood textures provided by Textures.com
  • Skyboxes created by Yuki2022
  • Low Poly Rocks created by Daniel Robnik
  • Smoke particle and Die Roll sound effect created by Kenny

All other artwork / models are original
